snippet.title: SCP: Fragmented Minds - Kickstarter Demo Trailer
snippet.description:
Back us Now on Kickstarter! https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/hststudiosllc/scp-fragmented-minds
Wishlist us on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1184790/SCP_Fragmented_Minds/
Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/3eBHnru
Explore an abandoned Martian research facility and face horrifying anomalies in this immersive blend of action and survival-horror inspired by Prey, Alien Isolation, and Control. SCP: Fragmented Minds is an action-packed survival-horror game with a strong emphasis on survival, crafting, immersive combat, and character interaction. 


#scp   #scpfoundation #kickstarter #unrealengine #indie #gamedev
